page.title: 03TRADE SHOPPING IN NARBERTH.
page.content: WHEN WE ASKED THE PEOPLE IN NARBERTH WHAT THEY THOUGHT OF THE CHOICE OF SHOPS HERE THEY ALL SAID THAT THEY WERE VERY GOOD OR EXCELLENT. IN NARBERTH WE HAVE THE FOLLOWING SHOPS CHEMIST,GROCERY,SWEET,TOY,MEAT, JEWELLERY,CLOTHES,SHOE AND PET. YOU CAN ALSO BUY GARDENING TOOLS, BUILDING MATERIALS AND PARTS FOR THE CAR.YOU CAN ALSO BUY PRESENTS, BOOKS, PLANTS, PAINT, PERFUME & STATIONARY. WE HAVE A SHOP WHICH SELLS EVERYTHING ELECTRICAL AND YOU CAN RENT OR BUY VIDEO TAPES.THERE IS NO WEEKLY MARKET. EARLY CLOSING DAY IS WEDNESDAY.
